trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the value and location of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> cell for use when copying content to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 封裝的值和位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>時將內容複製到剪貼簿的資料格。

trans-unit.source: This structure is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個結構由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs.ClipboardRowContent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref>結構。

trans-unit.source: The data item for the row that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 包含要複製的資料格的資料列的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 包含要複製的資料格的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的資料格文字值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含要複製的資料格的資料行。

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 包含要複製的資料格的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 取得要複製的資料格的文字值。

trans-unit.source: The text value of the cell being copied.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的資料格文字值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current and specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否目前和指定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref>執行個體相等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instance to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"> </xref>比較與目前的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前和指定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref>執行個體具有相同<> *>， <> </> *>，以及<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content*>屬性值，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個雜湊程式碼<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The hash code is based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊程式碼基礎<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A>屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridClipboardCellContent.Item%2A>
